title: salvation by blocks
quote: (an architectural stem cell that might transform itself into any organ for living)

title: ulam's staircase
quote: Futures not achieved are only branches of the past: dead branches.

title: rule thirty
quote: I have finally realized that what I am actually making is a pattern of understandings of the process of making rather than the things that are actually being made.
materials: Fineliner and graphite on whitelines grid.

title: city of walls
quote:
Being so, you will find
no door at which to knock,
nor any door to be opened.

title: industry
quote:
"Why is Thekla's construction taking such a long time?"

"So that its destruction cannot begin."

title: one's reach
quote:
When I point my finger at the moon,
don't mistake my finger for the moon.
materials: Fineliner and charcoal on mixed-media paper.

title: spill
quote: Twice every summer we discussed whether colors in nature could clash.

title: marionette
quote: But I know as well as everyone that these are empty dreams, and that having come this far, we cannot turn back.

title: untitled
quote: Some day, will you be satisfied and want for nothing, yearning for nothing, and desiring nothing, animate or inanimate, to cater to your pleasures?

title: tower
quote:
"But when we give up symbols and opinions, aren't we left in the utter nothingness of being?"

Yes.

title: block
quote: If there were a part of life dark enough to keep out of it a light from art, I would want to be in that darkness, fumbling around if necessary, but alive.

title: anthropomorph
quote: And I am free to the extent I have this quality in me.

title: drill
quote:
There is so much time in these lands.
There are few hours.

title: sketches
quote: Only now can I understand these drawings as simple moments of clarity.
